Google sets aside $800M in ads and loans to help in COVID-19 fight

They’ll be giving away $20 million worth of Google Cloud credits to academic institutions and researchers that are tackling COVID-19. $200 million will go to an investment fund for nonprofits and financial institutions to provide small businesses with loans.
